actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-353.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1010) to amend the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 with respect to the movement of coal, including the movement of coal over public lands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1010 (coal pipelines).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1010) to amend the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 with respect to the movement of coal, including the movement of coal over public lands, and for other purposes.
